definitions.definition: (especially of an animal) to allow liquid to come out of the mouth, especially because of excitement or hunger:
examples: The dog slavered with excitement when told it was time for a walk.

definitions.definition: to show great interest or excitement in someone or something, in a way that is unpleasant to other people:
examples: Stop slavering over that guitar, Stephen!

definitions.definition: in the past, a ship used for carrying slaves, or a person who sold slaves
